Sentencas: The La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 perovskite compounds with different manganese concentrations (x = 0.0, 0.03, 0.06) were synthesized by the autocombustion method and annealed at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction (XRD) data indicated that all obtained compounds crystallize in the cubic structure with the Pm (3) over barm space group.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: The increase in the substitution rate has been found to lead to the decrease in the crystallite size value characterized by X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: The dielectric properties of these samples, using a complex impedance spectroscopy technique, were also performed as a function of frequency and temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: A suitable equivalent electrical circuit was used to assess the contributions of electrode, grains, and grain boundaries in the complex impedance results.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: Activation energies were determined from different methods.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: Nyquist plots were consistent with three circuits in series, each one with a capacitance in parallel with a resistance.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: The conduction mechanism follows the NSPT model for the three samples at T < 280 K, in which the rise in substitution rate increases the binding energy of carriers.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: Above 280 K, the appropriate model is the Correlated Barrier Hopping (CBH) for x = 0, while the overlapping large polaron tunneling (OLPT) process has been confirmed for both samples x = 0.03 and x = 0.06.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: Our compounds have high electrical properties, and good thermal and chemical stability.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)

Sentencas: They are susceptible to many technological applications, such as gas sensors, capacitors, filters, resonators, new read heads, and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and study of the structural and dielectric properties of La0.67Ca0.2Ba0.13Fe1-xMnxO3 ferrites (x=0, 0.03 and 0.06)
